short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Snap your AWS news to where you work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AWSnap fetches AWS news from various sources and presents only the news for services you are using in the AWS Console.

AWSnap is only active when you are in the AWS Console. After installation it will start monitoring the AWS services you use / browse to in the console and will start fetching relevant news for that service.

ğŸ—  0.1.2
Bugs Fixes:
- Articles can be unpinned again
- New articles will show summary instead of article link

ğŸ—  0.1.1 
This is a major improvement over the previous releases. 

We've switched to a new mechanism to store data client side (dexie.org) which improves responsiveness and reduces the amount of storage the application uses. This does mean articles you've seen before will be appear as new.
